data.title: Tunis Apartment Vacation Rentals - Tunis Governorate, Tunisia
data.meta_description: Find the perfect apartment rental for your trip to Tunis. Weekly apartment rentals, private apartment rentals, apartment rentals with a hot tub, and family-friendly apartment rentals. Find and book unique apartments on Airbnb.
data.text:
Rental unit in Tunis

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 32 reviews4.94 (32)

La tulipe du lac 2

This elegant accommodation is perfect for you located in the heart of the shores of Lake 2 If you are a fan of natural light and good ventilation with minimalist interior - this is a place for you in Tunis. Highly recommended for visitors staying for week or more. Although the neighborhood is quiet, 10-15 min drive will take you to all the happening areas in town. Minimalist interior, cosy and comfortable two bedroom apartment at a reasonable price - this can sum up the place. Btw, the TV has live channel

Rental unit in Tunis

4.81 out of 5 average rating, 36 reviews4.81 (36)

Secured and pleasant flat tunis near Lac & Marsa;

Nouveau petit logement cosy, aéré,lumineux ,sécurisé et à proximité de toutes commodités. richement meublé (clim, chauffage central, hotte, four et cuisiniere) , douche à hydromassage; etc. il se trouve au quartier des palmeraies-ain zaghouan à 10 minutes de l'aeroport et 10 minutes de la Marsa et à 5 min des berges du Lac. il est à noter que l’espace de vie est petit (canapé et kitchenette) et convient idéalement à un voyageur solo ou un couple) merci de se conformer aux règles de la maison

Rental unit in Ariana

4.93 out of 5 average rating, 99 reviews4.93 (99)

Let Living at Right Place (Ennasr), Netflix, NPTV

The apartment is located on the second floor in an apartment building equipped with two elevators. - One bedroom with king bed, one living room with Sofa bed, one kitchen, one bathroom, - One TV big screen in the living room and another TV in the bed room, equipped with premium channels, - Big balcony, - Coffee maker, iron/ironing board, - Fast internet (Fiber), - NETFLIX, NPTV Cozy and spacious with all the commodities. Located in the heart of a chic and safe neighborhood

Rental unit in Tunis

4.87 out of 5 average rating, 157 reviews4.87 (157)

Charming apartment with breathtaking views of the lake of Tunis

An apartment of very high standing with a magnificent view of Lake Tunis. Lively neighborhood with shops, restaurants and all the shops you may need. Near Hotel Concorde and Hotel de Paris . The apartment consists of a living room, two bedrooms and a fully equipped kitchen. Very bright and sunny thanks to its large windows including that of the living room overlooking a small balcony with a beautiful view where you can have breakfast in front of sunrise or sunset.

Rental unit in Ariana

5 out of 5 average rating, 115 reviews5 (115)

VHS & Luxury apartment 10 min from the airport

NOTE : IF YOU SEE IT AVAILABLE ON THE CALENDAR, SO FEEL FREE TO RESERVE IT INSTANTLY. Apartment prepared with love and attention, and special attention to cleanliness and hygiene. With a totally autonomous checkin/checkout using a code that I will be sent to you on the day of your arrival. You find everything you need for a comfortable and peaceful stay. During your stay i'm available via the app to assist you for whatever you need with great pleasure

Rental unit in Tunis

4.88 out of 5 average rating, 104 reviews4.88 (104)

Cosy downtown apartment Tunis.

A cozy and comfortable apartment, very convenient location in the center of Tunis City, Totally renovated and carefully decorated with Tunisian style. It’s near to necessary amenities and services (supermarket, restaurants, shops), Easy access to public transport means, 6 minutes walking to metro station. You can reach the old city gate (medina) and Habib Bourguiba Avenue in 15 minutes on foot. Tunis Carthage airport is 15 minutes away by Taxi.

Rental unit in Tunis

4.85 out of 5 average rating, 39 reviews4.85 (39)

Beautiful studio, living room, kitchen, bathroom

Discover our highly furnished S+1 apartment with a spacious living room, semi-open kitchen and balcony. The bedroom has a large dressing room. Equipped with 2 air conditioners, central heating, hob, range hood, washing machine, oven and storage. Enjoy the bar, the workspace, and a fast internet connection. On the 5th floor with double elevator, parking in the basement, close to all amenities and 5 minutes from the airport.

Rental unit in Marsa

4.92 out of 5 average rating, 112 reviews4.92 (112)

The Jazz House - Marsa

The Jazz House is an artsy stylish 1BR apartment maintained to high standards spread over a spacious lounge, an airy bedroom, a bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen in a private secure recently renovated building overlooking the park. It is located in the very heart of La Marsa, one of Tunis finest and most authentic neighbourhoods. It would perfectly suit a couple or business visitors, the flat accommodates up to 3 people.

Rental unit in Tunis

4.83 out of 5 average rating, 272 reviews4.83 (272)

S+1 Tunis city center

high standing apartment, 60 square meters,fully furnished . Located on the 1st floor in a quiet and secure residence at rue de marseille. composed of a beautiful living room with a double height false ceiling, a complete bedroom with its dressing room, a bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen. moreover the apartment is equipped with air conditioning, central heating, wifi, hd tv, washing machine...

Rental unit in Tunis

4.96 out of 5 average rating, 102 reviews4.96 (102)

The Pearl in Marsa Plage

This sumptuous S+1 is located in the heart of our charming city of MARSA on the most beautiful avenue Habib Bourguiba, a 5-minute walk from the beach and the center of Marsa. It is close to all amenities and is very accessible by public transport and taxi. This apartment is ideal for lovers or business travelers. you can't dream of a better address to enjoy your stay and our beautiful city .
